prompt.instruction:
Analyze this text post comprehensively and return JSON with: - topics and themes - writing style and quality - tone and sentiment - content category - engagement potential - any CTAs present - key points and takeaways - target audience
Be detailed but concise.
prompt.guidelines: - Focus on understanding the core message and value - Consider professional context (LinkedIn/X business content) - Evaluate how well the post would perform on social platforms - Assess clarity, impact, and relevance - Note any persuasive techniques or storytelling elements
